snippet: Parents and children may need to realign their attitudes and expectations as they grapple with the economic turmoil that has troubled the country.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column says that parents and children used to living upper-middle-class lives may need to realign their attitudes and expectations as they grapple with the economic turmoil that has troubled the country.
lead_paragraph: Parents and children may need to realign their attitudes and expectations as they grapple with the economic turmoil that has troubled the country.

headline.seo: Grappling With a New Economic Reality
headline.main: A New Reality About What a Family Can Really Afford
headline.print_headline: A New Reality About What A Family Can Really Afford
